borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2024/02332/FUL granted 14th February 2025 for the 'Demolition of three non-original existing buildings adjacent to Blocks A, B and D, and associated remedial works, installation of a new external lift on south facade of Block C, installation of a new external lift on north east facade of Block D, installation of new permanent external ramps to Block B and C, replacement of external doors, provision of short and long stay cycle parking, external landscaping works including new nature garden, new surfacing, reorganisation of planters, and new planting, and associated works' to allow amendments to the wording of condition 14 to read as follows: 'The development hereby approved shall be carried out and completed in full accordance with the details contained within the approved Biodiversity Net Gain Plan dated 2 July 2025 (V.4) and prepared by MKA Ecology.
